datasetVariables.description: Required as the purpose of this domain is to link each USUBJID to one or more devices.

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable DR.SPDEVID

datasetVariables.description: It must be unique for each tracked unit of the device under study, and can be at whatever level of granularity the device should be identified (e.g., model or serial number, or combination of identifiers) as defined in DI.
datasetVariables.label: Sponsor Device Identifier
datasetVariables.name: SPDEVID

description: A special-purpose domain that contains the linkage of each subject to the device(s) to which they may have been exposed during the study. (Source: CDISC Controlled Terminology, DOMAIN, C102620, 2018-06-29)
label: Device-Subject Relationships
name: DR
